oh, god, why didn't you tell me that! no wonder you were mad! i didn't know
that he didn't even have the area he was shooting at!.....so...i'm
sorry.......but you still didn't have to drag it out further, you could have
told me.....well, however, why was Ramhorn calling Suukie a traitor when
Stinkbomb shot first?....is it something that exists only in his own
mind?...i just wanted to know that..it was still a pretty shameful act with
your new character, the Rock......how about we pretend that post never
happened, as i can tell you meeant that as aa putdown to me.......okay?.....
